cmp: 壹 (one (alternate form of 一 used on checks))
mng: to choke (on), to choke up, to suffocate

exm.mng: lit. not eating for fear of choking (idiom); fig. to cut off one's nose to spite one's face, to avoid sth essential because of a slight risk
to choke (on), to choke off (in speech)
to choke on one's food, to be choked up emotionally, unable to speak
